revised_title: Propagation of Detonation in Thin Layers of Nitroglycerine: Experimental Study
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the propagation of detonation in thin layers of nitroglycerine. They used high-speed photography and various techniques to analyze the patterns and velocities of the detonation. The results provided insights into the behavior of nitroglycerine during detonation and the effects on surrounding surfaces.
